div.p: Welcome to the online home of the Edison Local School District, where our students and staff work diligently every day to become a district of excellence known for innovative teaching and high levels of student achievement in a 21st century learning facility. Our goal with this website is to provide you information you need in a timely, concise and transparent manner. If you have any questions, please contact our district offices at 740-282-0065.

article.class: elementor-post elementor-grid-item post-3688 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-news

div.p: The Edison Local School District is a participant district in Ohio’s Early Literacy Pilot. For the past three years, all teachers in grades Pre-K-3rd have gone through intensive professional learning on the science of reading utilizing LETRS (Language Essentials for Teachers of Reading and Spelling). The teachers are providing explicit instructional practices based on the science of reading. With the

article.class: elementor-post elementor-grid-item post-3683 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-news

h4.a: Changes to Preschool and Kindergarten Registration

article.class: elementor-post elementor-grid-item post-3655 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news

div.p: One Edison Jr. High student will have an opportunity of a lifetime by attending the inauguration of the nation’s 46th leader next year. Amelia Collopy, a seventh-grade student and daughter of Michael and Kelli Collopy of Wintersville, was nominated by the National Youth Leadership Foundation (NYLF) STEM staff to participate in the 2021 Presidential Inauguration festivities in January. Collopy

figure.figcaption: Be sure to log into Clever to access Freckle resources.

div.p: Resources for students provided by their teachers can be found at the links below. Please feel free to contact your teachers with any questions regarding the resources provided.

p.a: Student and Family at Home Tech Resources (Guides for Clever and Freckle)

div.p: For information specific to the Edison Local School District as well as information on free meal locations and pickup times, please view our page here:
We will be posting information regarding the measures we are currently taking.
